entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:59 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 9:55 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow or periods of rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
